item.title: Google CTF - Mobile 150 - Ill Intentions
item.description: The timing for this challenge was just about perfect for me. A new colleague of mine just last week did a presentation on smali basics and debugging Android Applications using IDA. Before that I had only done some of the most basic patches in smali and no real dynamic stuff other than with am or purpose-built apps. My process for an APK is pretty simple: Unzip, dex2jar, and apktool -d. This yields a .
